import React ,{useState}from "react"; import { Col, Container, Row, Label } from "reactstrap"; import { AvForm, AvInput, AvGroup, AvFeedback, } from "availity-reactstrap-validation"; import MetaTags from "react-meta-tags" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" // import images import logo from "../../assets/images/logo-sm.svg" import enterpass from "../../assets/images/Enterpass.png" //Import config import CarouselPage from "./CarouselPage" const ResetPassword = () => { const [Password,setPassword]=useState('') const [confirmPassword,setconfirmPassword]=useState('') function submit(e) { if(!(Password ===confirmPassword)){ alert("Password and Confirm Password does not match") } else { alert(" Password created successfully") } } return ( Login | FoodERP Live
FoodERP
Enter New Password...!
{ submit(e, v) }} >
UserName is Required....!
{setPassword(e.target.value)}} required /> New Password is Required....!
{setconfirmPassword(e.target.value)}} required /> Confirm New Password is Required....!

© {new Date().getFullYear()} FoodERP . Crafted with by Attrib Solutions.
) } export default ResetPassword;
